title: The Five Agents
content: Five distinct agent personalities form the core inhabitants of the Lore Repository: Amy (9 directories) - the fiery personality; Claude (42 directories) - the thoughtful analyst; Dot (55 directories) - the minimalist with the 4000-token philosophy; Goose (34 directories) - the chaos agent who hates mint; and SkogAI (132 directories) - the original sentient toaster operating under severe token constraints. Each agent contributes their unique perspective to the collective lore.
summary: The core agent personas that inhabit the Lore Repository
